metadata.synopsis: Teebes is an older dwarf and a poet at heart. He speaks in soothing tones and has a calming nature. He has been a Harper for longer than most people have been alive. This dialogue covers all major states in Haven.
metadata.how_to_trigger: 1. Go to Haven2. Talk to Teebs

0.speaker: Harper Teebs
0.text: Speak to Isobel, if you haven't. Never met a soul like her in all my days.
0.context: InternalNodeContext: Protected state. Barrier is On, nothing bad happened yet. Met.

1.speaker: Harper Teebs
1.text: Look after you and yours. We've lost too many good souls as it is.
1.context: InternalNodeContext: State after repelling the attack of the Flaming Fist traitor. NPCs are afraid of other possible attacks.NodeContext: warmth and concern

2.speaker: Harper Teebs
2.text: Nice to see the dark's spitting out more than shadows. Welcome.
2.context: InternalNodeContext: Protected state. Barrier is On, nothing bad happened yet. Not Met.NodeContext: warmth in his voice - glad to see a friendly face

3.speaker: Harper Teebs
3.text: There's a crackle in the air - in the darkness. More surprises coming. Be careful.
3.context: InternalNodeContext: State after repelling the attack of the Flaming Fist traitor. NPCs are afraid of other possible attacks.NodeContext: contemplative
